Key Match Events: Shahid Afridi took 4 for 22 in his four overs
Shakib Al Hasan adjudged lbw on field, and upheld on DRS even though he was certain he nicked the ball
Mohammad Haris hit a six in the death over
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won by 5 wickets (with 11 balls remaining)
Bangladesh lost their captain Shakib Al Hasan to an lbw decision
Bangladesh fought back and pushed the game into the death
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh's captain Shakib Al Hasan was distraught after the lbw decision
Bangladesh could have been distracted but they kept pushing the game into the death
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch wasn't great for strokeplay
Batters kept trying to hit out but it just wasn't happening
The Adelaide pitch could favor slow bowling in the semi-final against New Zealand
